title: StereoSampleGAN
broadDescription: StereoSampleGAN is a lightweight machine learning approach high fidelity stereo audio sample generation

details.point: Novel machine learning architecture to generate stereo, time-frequency representations of audio samples.
Independent research project, pending publishing. Continuation of UCLA COSMOS 2024 Research.
Skills: Advanced ML Training Techniques, Attention/Transformers, GANs, Signal Processing, Data Representation, Data Collection, AI Research.

title: VelocityDraft
broadDescription: VelocityDraft is a flexible essay writing scheduler webapp

details.point: Leverages user writing abilities and essay deadlines to algorithmically determine best order of essay writing to maximize writing and review time without overwhelming user.
Recieved third place prize in OneHacks III Hackathon.
Skills: GitHub Action Automation, Algorithmic Problem Solving, Website Interface Design

title: Digital Audio Production
broadDescription: Create professional full length compositions and songs

details.point: Learned audio production, synthesis, and engineering since July 2022. Collaborate with artists worldwide, build artist brand.
Understand physical applications of signal processing and manipulation to produce desired sounds
Create professional full length compositions and songs.
